entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
